name: Paracetamol
use: Relieves mild to moderate pain and reduces fever
description: A widely used over-the-counter analgesic and antipyretic.

name: Ibuprofen
use: Treats pain, inflammation, and fever
side_effects: stomach upset, dizziness, increased risk of bleeding

name: Amoxicillin
use: Treats various bacterial infections
description: A penicillin-type antibiotic used against many bacterial infections.

name: Metformin
use: Controls high blood sugar in type 2 diabetes
description: An oral diabetes medicine that helps control blood sugar levels.

name: Amlodipine
use: Treats high blood pressure and chest pain (angina)
description: A calcium channel blocker that dilates blood vessels.

name: Atorvastatin
use: Lowers cholesterol and triglyceride levels
description: A statin used to prevent cardiovascular disease.

name: Omeprazole
use: Treats acid reflux, ulcers, and GERD
description: A proton pump inhibitor that decreases stomach acid.

name: Levothyroxine
use: Treats hypothyroidism
description: A synthetic form of thyroid hormone.

name: Losartan
use: Treats high blood pressure and protects kidneys in diabetes

name: Salbutamol
use: Relieves bronchospasm in asthma and COPD
description: A bronchodilator that relaxes muscles in the airways.

name: Cetirizine
use: Relieves allergy symptoms like sneezing and runny nose

name: Montelukast
use: Prevents asthma and allergic rhinitis symptoms

name: Clopidogrel
use: Prevents blood clots after heart attack or stroke

name: Warfarin
use: Prevents and treats blood clots
description: An oral anticoagulant that inhibits vitamin K.

name: Prednisolone
use: Reduces inflammation in conditions like asthma and arthritis
side_effects: weight gain, mood swings, high blood pressure

name: Doxycycline
use: Treats bacterial infections including acne and respiratory infections

name: Tramadol
use: Relieves moderate to severe pain

name: Fluoxetine
use: Treats depression, OCD, and panic disorder

name: Insulin
use: Controls blood sugar in diabetes
side_effects: hypoglycemia, weight gain, injection site reactions

name: Furosemide
use: Treats fluid retention and high blood pressure

name: Naproxen
use: Reduces inflammation and pain in arthritis, muscle aches

name: Loratadine
use: Treats seasonal allergies

name: Propranolol
use: Treats high blood pressure and anxiety

name: Diazepam
use: Treats anxiety, seizures, and muscle spasms

name: Olanzapine
use: Treats schizophrenia and bipolar disorder

name: Esomeprazole
use: Treats GERD and stomach ulcers

name: Ranitidine
use: Reduces stomach acid to treat ulcers and GERD
description: An H2 receptor blocker (Note: withdrawn in many countries).

name: Duloxetine
use: Treats depression and nerve pain

name: Levofloxacin
use: Treats bacterial infections including pneumonia and UTI

name: Risperidone
use: Treats schizophrenia and bipolar disorder
